name: BottomNavigationBar
desc: A material widget that's displayed at the bottom of an app for selecting among a small number of views, typically between three and five.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: Defines the appearance of the button items that are arrayed within the bottom navigation bar.

fields.name: onTap
fields.desc: Called when one of the [items] is tapped.

fields.name: currentIndex
fields.desc: The index into [items] for the current active [BottomNavigationBarItem].

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate of this [BottomNavigationBar].

fields.name: type
fields.desc: Defines the layout and behavior of a [BottomNavigationBar].

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The color of the [BottomNavigationBar] itself.

fields.name: iconSize
fields.desc: The size of all of the [BottomNavigationBarItem] icons.

fields.name: selectedItemColor
fields.desc: The color of the selected [BottomNavigationBarItem.icon] and [BottomNavigationBarItem.label].

fields.name: unselectedItemColor
fields.desc: The color of the unselected [BottomNavigationBarItem.icon] and [BottomNavigationBarItem.label]s.

fields.name: selectedIconTheme
fields.desc: The size, opacity, and color of the icon in the currently selected [BottomNavigationBarItem.icon].

fields.name: unselectedIconTheme
fields.desc: The size, opacity, and color of the icon in the currently unselected [BottomNavigationBarItem.icon]s.

fields.name: selectedLabelStyle
fields.desc: The [TextStyle] of the [BottomNavigationBarItem] labels when they are selected.

fields.name: unselectedLabelStyle
fields.desc: The [TextStyle] of the [BottomNavigationBarItem] labels when they are not selected.

fields.name: selectedFontSize
fields.desc: The font size of the [BottomNavigationBarItem] labels when they are selected.

fields.name: unselectedFontSize
fields.desc: The font size of the [BottomNavigationBarItem] labels when they are not selected.

fields.name: showUnselectedLabels
fields.desc: Whether the labels are shown for the unselected [BottomNavigationBarItem]s.

fields.name: showSelectedLabels
fields.desc: Whether the labels are shown for the selected [BottomNavigationBarItem].

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the items.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.

fields.name: landscapeLayout
fields.desc: The arrangement of the bar's [items] when the enclosing [MediaQueryData.orientation] is [Orientation.landscape].

fields.name: useLegacyColorScheme
fields.desc: This flag is controlling how [BottomNavigationBar] is going to use the colors provided by the [selectedIconTheme], [unselectedIconTheme], [selectedItemColor], [unselectedItemColor]. The default value is `true` as the new theming logic is a breaking change. To opt-in the new theming logic set the flag to `false`

nodes.name: Page Switching with PageView
desc: Use the controller for page switching during onTap
